                    PololuCard.PololuCardType type)
                             throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Create a Pololu card regarding the Android context and the card type.
        Parameters:
        context - The Android context.
        type - The card type.
        Returns:
        A new Pololu card.
        Throws:

        channel - The servo motor position.

      • changeTarget

        public void changeTarget(int target,
                int channel)
        Change the position of the servo motor identified by the number channel. The position must be sent through the target variable as a percentage.
        Parameters:
        target - The percentage representing the rotation angle of the servo motor. 50 represents the middle position.
        channel - The servo motor position.
